CustomField.formula: IF( !ISBLANK( TEXT( Waiver_Status__c ) ) , IMAGE( CASE( Waiver_Status__c , "Signed", "https://asphaltgreen.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0156Q000003Qhas&oid=00DVB0000001IVx&lastMod=1670343201000", "Not Required", "https://asphaltgreen.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0156Q000003Qhax&oid=00DVB0000001IVx&lastMod=1670343248000", "Pending", "https://asphaltgreen.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0156Q000003Qhb2&oid=00DVB0000001IVx&lastMod=1670343236000", "" ) , "Waiver Status" , 25, 100 ), "" )
CustomField.label: Waiver Status
